knowledge.description: You've heard whispers about suspicious activity at the Old Mill. The waterwheel's sudden failure seems deliberate, not accidental.
You know which individuals have regular access to the mill's workshop tools. This knowledge could be crucial for determining who had the means to sabotage the waterwheel.
You've examined the waterwheel mechanism and found clear evidence of deliberate damage. The gear teeth show scoring marks consistent with intentional sabotage using a chisel or similar tool.
Based on your investigation, you've identified a likely suspect in the waterwheel sabotage. Elena's reaction when mentioning her apprentice Aldric was telling.
